title: Reconnecting to games
body: Yo please help, I joined champ select and I picked champ and waiting to play then all of a sudden i'm stuck in champ select for like 2 mins. I restart client and there is a reconnect button when log back in but the button does not work and i'm only online not in game in my friends list. PLES HELP RITO. {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hi

This might have been related to the [server issues](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/zcrEGeXl-resolved-server-issues-28th-jan-2015) going on at that time.  Let me know if it is still a problem.

Cheers
Mindstar
